v0.0.1.description:
Surprise release, already **playable**! A complete new way to solve a Twisty Cube!
### What?
The game randomizes the cube by only starting with a couple of stickers.
As you go, you'll find more stickers and you'll be able to complete your cube.
Of course you can play via Archipelago, where you find items for partially solving and others find your stickers.
:warning: this game might be much harder than you think, even if you know how to solve cubes. Maybe we can make some custom guides.
### How?
You can play here: https://cube-ap.netlify.app/
Click on one of the **solo buttons** to give it a quick try, no need to set up a server and such!
**Controls**: move with the mouse. You can also use letters F, B, L, R, U, D and Shift-F, Shift-B, ... to move faces. Arrow keys (Left, Right, Up, Down) and Shift-Arrow (Shift-up, Shift-Down) to rotate the cube.
### Where?
The **apworld** and default **yaml** are included in this release.
### And?
- The scoring is a bit weird maybe. Just have each side have one color and you'll be fine :)
- In solo, no progress is saved. In Archipelago, of course your checks and items are saved, but your last configuration of the cube is not.
- This game is based on the brilliant work of https://codepen.io/bsehovac/pen/EMyWVv, which allows for any changes.
v0.0.1.title: Twisty Cube for AP v0.0.1

v0.0.2.description:
# Version 0.0.2 of Twisty Cube

### New features
- added the option for a 5x5x5 cube [yaml option]
- added option to randomize color layout (so you don't know where each color go) [yaml option]
- added deathlink [option before pressing login in the game]

Shoutouts to @BaNyaaNyaa!

### How?
You can play here: https://cube-ap.netlify.app/
Click on one of the **solo buttons** to give it a quick try, no need to set up a server and such!
**Controls**: move with the mouse. You can also use letters F, B, L, R, U, D and Shift-F, Shift-B, ... to move faces. Arrow keys (Left, Right, Up, Down) and Shift-Arrow (Shift-up, Shift-Down) to rotate the cube.
### Where?
The **apworld** and default **yaml** are included in this release.
v0.0.2.title: Twisty Cube for AP v0.0.2

v1.0.0.description:
# Version 1.0.0!
Massive thanks to @nepcore, @BaNyaaNyaa and @bbernardoni for basically everything in this update!

- option to complete goal even without all stickers
- New scoring (you get more points more easily)
- Save system to keep your layout
- Loading screen
- Hide stickers before shuffling (only when layout is randomized)
- queue inputs and execute keyboard inputs faster
- "prevent undo after death link to prevent chrism from cheesing it"

I think that's the main changes :D
v1.0.0.title: Twisty Cube for AP v1.0.0
